pages.text: Summoned from a $(l:misc/boss_blocks/hell_bros_boss_block)Hell Bros. Boss Block$(/l)

Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Health: 80$(br2)Special moves:$(li)Transforms into $(l:build/riders/bros#hell)Hell Bros$(/l) if you have the $(l:build/items/gears#gear_remocon)Gear Remocon$(/l) in your inventory$(br2)Drops$(li)2-3 $(l:build/items/full_bottle)Empty Bottles$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:build/items/gears#gear_engine)Gear Engine$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:build/items/full_bottle)Empty Bottle$(/l) (75%)$(li)1 $(l:build/items/gears#gear_engine_red)Gear Engine (Red)$(/l) (25%)
